synchrono.midnightconfig.title: Synchrono Configuration
synchrono.midnightconfig.coords_descript: The coordinates of the physical location of the server, with as much precision as desired
synchrono.midnightconfig.invert_descript: Turn daytime into nighttime and vice-versa
synchrono.midnightconfig.gametime_enable: Enable modifying in-game time and daylight cycle
synchrono.midnightconfig.debug_descripti: Options meant for debugging or advanced usage
synchrono.midnightconfig.api_properties_: Specify which results to retrieve from the API (sunrise = 0t, sunset = 12000t)
